recommended_degree: Pendidikan  Bahasa Inggris, Pendidikan Guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD), Pendidikan Guru Sekolah Dasar (PGSD), Pendidikan matematika, Pendidikan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Instructional Support
- Prepare teaching materials and learning resources.
- Assist students during class activities and tasks.
- Provide additional clarification or guidance to students who need it.

2. Classroom Management
- Help maintain a safe, orderly, and positive classroom environment.
- Support students during transitions between activities.
- Monitor student behavior and ensure overall safety.
- Organize worksheets, student work, and classroom documents.
- Provide additional support to students who require extra attention.
- Maintain confidentiality of student information and school matters.
